description:
It’s official. “Shameless” has been renewed for Season 8. Showtime has ordered 12 episodes for the eighth season of the ensemble dramedy, starring Emmy Rossum and William H. Macy. Production begins in 2017, and no premiere date has been set yet.官方宣称《无耻之徒》续订第八季。Showtime已经续订这部剧情、喜剧题材的电视剧，与以往一致本季依旧12集，主演是Emmy Rossum 和William H. Macy。本季将在2017年开拍，回归日期待定。

The announcement comes the day after “Shameless” wrapped up its seventh season with the finale airing. The renewal follows a contract dispute over equal pay with star Emmy Rossum, which was settled last week.这条消息是《无耻之徒》第七季最后一集播出后公开的，在上周与女主演Emmy Rossum签订关于薪资与男主演一致的新合约之后。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 《无耻之徒》第八季获续订，明年开拍
